combatEffectTemplates.description: Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that is removed after a number of the character's turns, and at the end of a fight. Also configures the icons turn text to show the number of turns remaining.

Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that is removed after a number of the character's target's turns, and at the end of a fight. Also configures the icons turn text to show the number of turns remaining

Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for applying modifiers that increase in strength each time the effect is (re)applied, up to a maximum amount. Adds the modifier's descriptions, and the number of stacks applied to the effects tooltip.
A Modifier effect that applies static modifiers, and counts down on the character's turn
A Modifier effect that applies static modifiers, and counts down on the character's target's turn
A Modifier effect that applies stacking modifiers, and counts down on the character's turn
A Modifier effect that applies stacking modifiers, and counts down on the character's target's turn
A Modifier effect that applies stacking modifiers, that lasts until the end of combat
Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that increases a character's attack interval for a number of their turns. Requires behaviours that adjust the stacks modifierGroup
A Modifier effect that applies static modifier equal to the magnitude parameter

Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that: Interrupts a character's turn when applied; prevents them from attacking, evading attacks or regenerating barrier and causes them to take additional damage for a number of turns.

Endpoint Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that: Interrupts a character's turn when applied; prevents then from attacking or regenerating barrier, and causes them to take 30% more damage. Also grants immunity to stuns for 3 turns.
Endpoint Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that: Interrupts a character's turn when applied; prevents then from attacking or regenerating barrier, and causes them to take 30% more damage.
Endpoint Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that: Interrupts a character's turn when applied; prevents then from attacking or regenerating barrier, and causes them to take 50% more damage.
Endpoint Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that: Interrupts a character's turn when applied; prevents then from attacking or regenerating barrier, and causes them to take 20% more damage.
Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that applies modifiers that increase in strength each time the character is hit by an attack, up to a maximum value.

Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that applies modifiers that decrease in strength each time the character is hit by an attack. The effect is removed if the applied modifiers reach zero.
Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that applies modifiers that increase at the end of each character turn

Mixin Template. Defines behaviours for an effect that applies modifiers that increase in strength at the end of a character's turn, up to a maximum value. The turn after the modifiers reach the maximum value, they are reset to zero.
An effect that applies stacks of modifiers. Stacks are increased by 1 each time the character hits with an attack. The effect is removed if the character misses with an attack , or combat ends.

Mixin Template. Defines an effect that deals a total amount of damage, spread out over a number of 'procs' that occur at a fixed interval. A DamageCharacter/DamageBarrier behaviour that triggers on the 'proc' TimerFired, should be defined on descendant data.
Base template for Fear effects. Interrupts a character's turn when applied, and increases their attack interval by 30% for the next turn. Also grants immunity to Fear effects for 3 turns.
Endpoint Template. Used for the Laceration effect.
Endpoint Template. Used for the Ablaze DOT effect.
Endpoint Template. Used for the Toxin DOT effect.
Base template for all curse effects. Curse effects apply fixed modifiers for 3 of the character's turns. Only 1 curse effect can be active at once.

attacks.name: Curse Totem Summon
attacks.description: You perform a regular attack. On use, you summon a curse totem that applies a random Curse for 3 turns. Avoidable.
attacks.descriptionGenerator: <Attacker> perform a regular attack. On use, <attacker> summon a curse totem that <prehitEffect>. <Avoidable>.

attacks.name: Brute Force
attacks.description: Perform an attack that deals up to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your normal damage.

gamemodes.name: BGS Ancient Relic Mode
rules: The Combat Triangle penalties for using a combat style the enemy is resistant to are increased.
Only  skill start with a maximum Skill Level cap of Level 10.
For new game, only Attack, Strench, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, Magic, Cartography and Archaeology are unlocked with maximum skill level cap of 10
Other unlocked skills can be unlock by currency.
Level Cap of Attack, Strench, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, Magic, Cartography and Archaeology will be increased by defeat dungeons.
The Level Cap of other skills will be increased by currency, limited by levels of Attack, Strench, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged and Magic.
